title: XOMA - Bad Process (2002) + Militant EP (2006)
description:
XOMA - Bad Process (2002) + Militant EP (2006)

Founded in 2000 by Terrence Hamilton, Xoma is based in the outskirts of Sydney, Australia, and is currently a studio-based noise project.

This is the most recent release by Xoma, a Sydney based powernoise artist. This EP was originally going to be released as a physical item, but Xoma decided circumstance better allowed it being heard released digitally for everyone to listen to. This EP is a combination of hard beats, topped and tailed with harsh ambient noise. 

Country: Australia
Label: Uncomfortable Records
Release: 2002 / 2006 EP
Genre: Industrial; Power Electronics, Ambient Rhythmic Noise; Hardcore Techno
